options.name: platoons-export
options.description: export platoon requirements to excel file (RotE only right now)

options.name: relic
options.description: max relic level for platoons (defaults to 9)

options.name: roster
options.description: include guild member unit status (defaults to true)

options.name: allycode_option
options.description: primary or alt allycode

options.name: platoons-cache
options.description: clear platoon cached data

options.name: my-platoons
options.description: Show my tb platoons (requires web site configured mapping)

options.name: allycode_option
options.description: primary or alt allycode

options.name: platoons
options.description: Check tb Platoon filling

options.name: tb-name
options.description: tb to look up (Default is Rise of the Empire)

options.name: phase
options.description: tb phase to check (default is all)

options.name: conflict
options.description: tb conflict/section to check (default is all)

options.name: fill_squad
options.description: require squad to be full to show assignement (default is true)

options.name: info
options.description: Basic info about Territory battle

options.name: points
options.description: points for each star level

options.name: tb-name
options.description: tb to look up (Default is Rise of the Empire)

options.name: combat-mission
options.description: points for combat missions

options.name: tb-name
options.description: tb to look up (Default is Rise of the Empire)

options.name: status
options.description: (requires google/fb link) Pulls current Territory Battle stats

options.name: allycode_option
options.description: primary or alt allycode

options.name: gp
options.description: TB GP info

options.name: char
options.description: (requires google/fb link) Reports if player char GP is less than deployed GP

options.name: allycode_option
options.description: primary or alt allycode

options.name: low
options.description: (requires google/fb link) Reports if player deployed GP is less than 2mil

options.description: (requires google/fb link) Reports if player total GP is less than deployed GP

options.description: (requires synced guild) runs tb status command 15 mins before phase switch
